content.html: The SerenityOS Browser now passes the Acid3 test! 🥳🐞🌍 AFAIK we're the first new open source browser to reach this milestone since the test originally came out. This has been a team effort over the last couple of weeks, and I'm so proud of everyone who contributed! 🤓❤️
content.value:
The SerenityOS Browser now passes the Acid3 test! 🥳🐞🌍

AFAIK we're the first new open source browser to reach this milestone since the test originally came out.

This has been a team effort over the last couple of weeks, and I'm so proud of everyone who contributed! 🤓❤️

photo.alt: Screenshot of the Acid3 web standards compliance test in SerenityOS Browser. The score is 100/100.
